message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.HC 

The paper deals with job recommendation using machine learning, which falls under the information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of skills as embedded features and derived latent competencies from them suggests the involvement of natural language processing (cs.CL) and computer vision (cs.CV) techniques. Additionally, the paper mentions the importance of making recommendations serendipitous for the end user and overcoming cold-start for both candidates and jobs, which indicates the involvement of human-computer interaction (cs.HC) sub-category.
